transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir good morning.
Customer: Haan mam baat sun rahe hain ji.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji haan ji bataiye.
Customer: Haan number ek to jo meri baat aapse ho rahi hai usko by record pe laga lo ji.
Executive: Sir recording hi hai.
Customer: Achcha recording hi hai.
Executive: Theek hai ji.
Customer: Baat aisi hai mam ke aap kisi ko hume kuch marzi batai chalo kuch marzi kahi chalo ji.
Customer: Sade mutabik thode kole asi package kive lavange ji thode kole leeda hi nahi aa rahi ji sade kole leeda sunne band kitiya hoyia ne ji sade kole leeda tusi ae dasso edde top de asi karigar bithaye hoye ne ji sade matlab ki oh aa jido lead aandi aa naal di naal chakde aa naal di naal matlab ki khatam ho jandi aa lead hi nahi aandi ji tusi ae dasso ji India mart de karoda rupaye da koda karoda duniya kam kar rahi hai ohde kole lead nahi aandi ji saver to sham tikar ji tusi kehne ho bhi asi do lakh da package dinne aa 50 hajar da package dinne aa 4 lakh da package dinne aa thode kolo package mam ki karange asi leke sade kole 40 hajar da package leke thode kole lead nahi aa rahi ji sade kole ji dasso tusi kehne ho bhi sade kole leeda aaiya ne dasso kehdiya leeda aaiya ne ji sade kole 15-15 din diya tusi leeda dass rahe ho bhi sade kole 20-20 din diya leeda aaiya ne ji sade char karigar bithaye hoye ne ji sade kole matlab ki tusi dass de ho bhi thode kole bandeya nu thode nu leeda nahi leniya aandi ji.
Customer: B.Tech wale sade bachche matlab ki ede naal touch ne ji kiran.
Customer: Mam jedi gal thodi mannan wali hou asi mannange leeda de utte 1% nahi asi mann de bhi sanu tusi leeda de rahe ho ji.
Customer: Sada tusi jive nal de vichon pani hunda na ji bhi aapa full karde aa oh khol ta jere vadde package vaste ne unna nu us hisab naal kholya hoya jere chhote package waleya nu ne tusi sanu us hisab naal kholya jado thode sade naal deal kiti aa thoda farz banda si sanu dassna bhi je tusi is tarah da package lavoge thode kole limit diya matlab ki asi leeda wali gal mann de aa bhi tusi sanu leeda sat deti aa asi sat naal santusht aa da 10 17 leeda deniya ne asi 17 naal santusht aa koi dikkat nahi hai gi sadi gal sun liyo meri benti sun liyo par gal is tarah oh jo leeda ne jo apne kole package aapa ne 100 da mann lo numbering de vich aapa koi bhi matlab ki tamola khed de aa ya koi mera udharan de da matlab hai ji aapa tamola khed de aa ohde vichon aapa ne sitt ta ji vich matlab ki 100 number sitt te ohde vich karan ki aa thode vich power si tusi apne 20 bande bitha te kise de vich power hai unne 10 bande bitha te mera samjhan da mera tarika samajh liyo ji kise de vich power si unne panj bande bitha te sade vich power si asi do bande bitha te mann lo ohde vich sade kole 100 de vichon jo bhi leeda aaniya ne jediya marzi leeda aa jaan ji par oh band karan da ta nahi maksad hai ji bhi tusi jediya 50 bande ne unna kole full leeda jaan jediya dusre bande ne unna kole na jaan ji kiran eh ta nahi koi company da rule hai ji kise tarah da ji hun sanu benti sadi sunn liyo asi sanu jedi dassni si dass ti hun sanu dass do ji sadi tasalli karao bhi ki eh hai ji asi kehne aa 100% sade naal matlab ki gumrah kita ja raha sanu ji kiran.
Executive: Sir koi gumrah nahi kiya ja raha hai aapko pehli cheez aur dusri cheez na by lead ki rahi baat to by lead aapko ja rahi hai samajh nahi aa raha.
Customer: Kahan ja rahi hai mam meri baat suno meri benti suno aap batao hume matlab ki mere.
Executive: Fast and up multivitamin a supplement aapka hi product hai.
Customer: Madam meri baat suno kuch marzi keh do is pe lead hi nahi aati ji koi.
Executive: Sir aap mujhe bataiye to fast and up multivitamin a supplement aapka hi product hai.
Customer: Ek minute karde aa haan ji haan batao ji.
Executive: Fast and up multivitamin a supplement aapka hi product hai.
Customer: Haan ji haan.
Executive: To isme to by lead aayi hui hai hajar strip ki order value hai ek se do lakh ki Delhi ki by lead hai aap check to kariye ek baar.
Customer: Chalo main aapki bol raha hun te arvneet dekhi kehdi lead kehnde ne madam ek minute ji.
Customer: Tusi ae dasso aapa tin mahine ho gaye thode naal judeya nu ji thode mutabik hi tusi kehne ho bhi ek lead aayi hui hai ji.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Tusi ae dasso apniya leeda kinne bhejiya ji.
Customer: Te hello.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Haan aap bata rahe hain bhi ek lead aayi hai ji aapko bhi laga ji main bhi sahi bol rahe matlab ki koi ek lead wali baat jamti hai ji.
Executive: Nahi matlab main aap ek lead nahi aayi hui hai sir ye agar lead aapke kaam ki nahi hai humko ye puch rahi hun.
Customer: Madam baat aisi hai.
Executive: Ek lead nahi hai lead kafi hai.
Customer: Haan aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Madam savere ke sham tak meri baat suno aap koi bhi khol lo hamara techa ji.
Customer: Savere se sham tak aapke pass lead hi nahi aati ji.
Executive: Hamare pass kaise aayegi ji jo hamare pass aa rahi hai aapke pass hamara biodata hai ji itne matlab ki bachche karigar kisko bana diya hai ji kiran to ek stint mein hi matlab ki humne photo bhi khichi hui hai jab bhi matlab ki lead lete hain na ji usi time khatam ho jati hai ji aise thodi hota hai ji to aap kahoge na hamare bachche matlab ki itne karigar hain matlab ki.

Customer: Oh kholi India mart di kehdi lead aayi hui hai kehnde vitamin wali capsule wali.
Executive: Chalo.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Ah sir abhi mam aapko connect kar rahe hain do minute dijiye mam aapko.
Customer: Haan ji haan koi baat nahi ji koi baat nahi main matlab ki humne sara kuch iska survey kar liya ji te isliye nahi kaha aapko kyunki hamari puri discuss hui hai aapko matlab ki kisi ko na kehne ke maksad to hamara dekho aapke sath deal hui hai aapke sath deal karni hai badi bhi karni hai par iska hamara jo maksad hai samjhane wala wo jaise nal mein pani hai na usko full kholo hume ek deni hai koi baat nahi hai hume ek do do do hamari jo aapke sath commitment hai jitni lead deni hai hume wo do par do aap hamare pass jo full aati hai usme se do to aise nahi hai bhi aap usko band karke chhod do bhi aapko jo ek do channi hoti hai na jaise hum bata rahe hain isiliye kaha tha mam jo bhi hamari baat hai by record honi chahiye kyunki hamari humne sunwai karni hai aise nahi hai bhi kisi ko koi kisi ke shan mein koi baat kehni hai ek tarah bhi aapki shan mein koi kehni hai kisi mein shan mein kehni hai kyunki sabse badhiya aur sabse achcha pecha hai isliye hum matlab ki apna kam karna chahte hain aapke sath aise nahi hai bhi koi hume dikkat hai ya nahi dikkat hai company ki hamare sath dikkat thi hume jo laga humne uska survey kiya pura kyunki jiske pass jaisa package hai uske sath baat hui te baat hi matlab ki lead ki teen lead aati hai shanivar ko dekho ji saturday ko mann lo hamari aath lead padi thi lead hi do aayi ji kya kare usko chhod dena padta hai bachche kehte hain 15 din ki le le 15 din ki kya karenge lene wale ji.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Aap jaise na matlab ki hum kahenge aap kahoge kaise udharan dete hain tamola khelte hain na maine bataya aapko 100 number hote hain 100 number usko chhod do main nahi kehta kisi ka naam dal lo na dalo hume kisi se koi matlab nahi hai jo hamara naam hai jis hisab se aapse baat hui hai usi hisab se hamara us mein kam matlab ki tamole wale kam mein na jaise 100 number mein hamara dalo hamare pass ek lead leni hai hum usme se lenge do lead leni hai hum usme se le lenge kyunki hum char to le nahi sakte ji jitna hamara banega usi hisab se lenge lenge hum full wale mein ji aise nahi hai matlab ki haan aap usme se chhat do mann lo bade package wale aate hain usme chhat do chhote wale usme chhat do hamare pass bilkul jo nark wala kam hai wo aap hume bhej do ji.
Customer: Hum isko bakayda keh rahe hain aise nahi keh rahe by record keh rahe hain kyunki humne survey kar liya aapki sara kuch ji kyunki teen mahine se hum matlab ki tension mein pad rahe hain hamara pure companyo ke sath biodata matlab ki baat hui hai isliye sir kyunki mere pass na main koi survey kar matlab ki search karta hun product aapki company ka hamari taraf se usi time phone aa jata hai sir hum India mart se bol rahe hain aapne ye search kiya hai aapne purchase kiya hai maine kehta hai main purchase nahi kiya hum to seller hain hum mann rahe hain bhi aapka jo 4 lakh ka package hai 5 lakh ka package hai wo us hisab se hai hum wo nahi kehte bhi hume 4 lakh wali sahulat do par hum wo kehte hain bhi main 40 hajar laga ke kahun bhi mujhe 4 lakh wali sahulat do aap usko by phone pe batao kuch bhi batao par jo lead hai na jo niche aati hai girti hai aapke pass usme se matlab ki hume usi hisab se do wo nahi hum chahte.
Executive: Sir actually leads ka to jaise aap bol rahe ho lead hamare yahan sabke liye barabar hai aisa nahi hai ki hamare hath mein hota hai hum personally aapko share karte hain alag alag aapke alag alag.
Customer: Meri meri baat suno aapke pass mera biodata hai dekho te unnu puchhi te aapke pass biodata hai aap teen mahine ka matlab ki aap dekh lo bhi aap mere pass kitni lead aayi hai ji hmm eh ta asi 15-15 din di pata madam aap ye bataiye lead to consume kar rahe hain na aap madam lead hi nahi aati ji sir fir consume kaise ho rahi hai mujhe ye samajh nahi aa rahi oh ta purani pata kya hai hmm agle nu puchni keh nahi si ji bau te madam oh ta pata ki hai lead asi chakde aa oh khatam ho gayi ohda ki fayda ji ehda matlab ki eh ta dram matlab ki tusi kahoge eh gal kehnda ji eh ta sirf dramebazi hai ji eh matlab ki harassment karan vaste ji kara nahi harassment wali baat nahi sir kahan ki baat madam harassment wali baat hai ji kyunki pata kya hai aap kehte ho meri meri benti to sun lo ji is pe teen matlab ki char bande hum lage hue hain ji hamari puri matlab ki sunwai thi bhi hum teen mahine mein matlab ki aapka bada package bade package le lenge par bada package matlab ki majburi kya banegi hume chhote package mein aapke pass kuch nahi dikh raha hai ji hum bade package mein kya karenge ji aap mujhe ye bataiye aapke pass jo by lead aayi hai aapne wo consume ki hai unka madam aa raha hai kyunki sir by lead na aane ka matlab hai ki by lead aa hi nahi rahi.
Customer: But pata kya hai meri baat suno oh dalte hain jo na matlab ki dal diya usko sangrur ka ji te oh hai UP ki baad mein aur kehta hai oh pehle matlab ki dalta hai eh ki gal kari hello ek minute back call karda main gal chal rahi hai bahar ek minute ch kar de back call te hello hanji hanji haan pehle matlab ki na jaise matlab ki tha dala lead aayi ji uski pen color ki ji pen color ka jo salt tha uska dala uske baad matlab ki usne change kar diya matlab ki jaise main main nahi kehta wo aapke taraf se nahi hai hota hai sabke aata hai par wo na jo matlab ki waisi free wali matlab ki faltu lead hoti hai wo hume bheji ja rahi hai wo hume bheji ja rahi hai aise nahi hai matlab ki hamare pass lead kyunki pata kya hai hum anjaan ho sakte hain ji anjaan the hum main nahi kehta mam main anjaan the hum aapko call kar rahe hain ek minute rukiye bas mam aapko call kar rahe hain just a second just a second hum anjaan the hum mante hain
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving enough quality buyleads.

- Feels misled about the subscription benefits.

- Claims leads are old or irrelevant.

- Alleges leads are being unfairly distributed.



Resolution:

- Executive stated recording for quality purposes.

- Executive confirmed the customer's product.

- Executive mentioned a recent relevant buylead.

- Executive offered to connect with another representative.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect the customer to another representative.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, customer service, quality
